typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/int19/dbo.INT_Place.parquet']) ~> FilePlace
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/int19/dbo.INT_Street.parquet']) ~> FileStreet
